en: Blessed are they that are perfect in the way, Who walk in the law of Jehovah.
hmr: Kawnglama mi ṭha fam- kimhai chu an hamṭha ie, LALPA dân hrawtuhai chu.

en: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, That seek him with the whole heart.
hmr: A thuinhriettirhai zâwmtuhai chu an hamṭha, Lungril po poa zawngtuhai chu.

en: Yea, they do no unrighteousness; They walk in his ways.
hmr: Anih, anni chun fel nawna hrim hrim an thaw nawh a, A lampuihaia chun an fe hlak.

en: Thou hast commanded us thy precepts, That we should observe them diligently.
hmr: Nangin i thununna thuhai chu thupêkin i mi pêk a, Ṭhahnemngaitaka kan zâwm theina dingin.

en: Oh that my ways were established To observe thy statutes!
hmr: Aw, i thuruothai chu zâwm dingin, Ka um dânhai hi sukdetin um ta ve sien chu aw!

en: Then shall I not be put to shame, When I have respect unto all thy commandments.
hmr: Chu pha chun muolpho naw ning, I thupêkhai po po ka pawisak pha chun.

en: I will give thanks unto thee with uprightness of heart, When I learn thy righteous judgments.
hmr: Lungril indiktak putin lawmthu hril ka ti che, I rorêlna felhai chu kân chûk thiem pha chun.

en: I will observe thy statutes: Oh forsake me not utterly. ב BETH.
hmr: I thuruot chu zâwm ka ta, Aw, mi mâksan sawng naw rawh.

en: Wherewith shall a young man cleanse his way? By taking heed thereto according to thy word.
hmr: Tleirâwlin iengtin am a um dân sukthieng thei a ta? I thu ang peia a um dân chu vêngṭhain,

en: With my whole heart have I sought thee: Oh let me not wander from thy commandments.
hmr: Ka lungril po po hin ka zawng cheh a, Aw, i thupêkhai ka fehmangsan chu phal lul naw rawh.

en: Thy word have I laid up in my heart, That I might not sin against thee.
hmr: I chunga thil ka suksuol nawna dingin, I thu chu ka lungrilah kân khâwl khâwm a.

en: Blessed art thou, O Jehovah: Teach me thy statutes.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nang chu inpâk tlâk i nih ie, I thuruothai chu min chûktir rawh.

en: With my lips have I declared All the ordinances of thy mouth.
hmr: I baua i rorêl suok po pohai chu, Ka hmûrin kan hriettir tah.

en: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, As much as in all riches.
hmr: I thuinhriettir kawnga chun ka hlim a, Hausakna po poa ka hlim ang elin,

en: I will meditate on thy precepts, And have respect unto thy ways.
hmr: I thununna thuhai chu ngaituong ka ta, I lampuihai chu ngaisak bawk ka tih.

en: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word. ג GIMEL.
hmr: I thuruothai chunga chun lâwm ka ta, I thu chu theinghil naw ning.

en: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live; So will I observe thy word.
hmr: Ka hring theina dingin i siehlaw chunga hin ṭhatakin thaw la, Chuongchun, i thu chu zâwm ka tih.

en: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold Wondrous things out of thy law.
hmr: I dân thua inthawka thilmak ka hmu theina dingin, Ka mithai hi mi sukvarpêk rawh.

en: I am a sojourner in the earth: Hide not thy commandments from me.
hmr: Hnuoia hin mikhuol ka na, I thupêkhai chu ka kuoma chun ip naw rawh.

en: My soul breaketh for the longing That it hath unto thine ordinances at all times.
hmr: Ka hringna hi kawi darin a um a, Ienglai khawma i rorêlnahai a ngai leiin.

en: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, That do wander from thy commandments.
hmr: Mi chapo ṭawngsephurhai chu i kâwk a, I thupêkhai invâkhmangsan hlakhai chu.

en: Take away from me reproach and contempt; For I have kept thy testimonies.
hmr: Hrilsietna le hmusitna hi ka kuoma inthawkin la hmang la, I thuinhriettirhai chu ka zâwm sih a.

en: Princes also sat and talked against me; But thy servant did meditate on thy statutes.
hmr: Mi lienhai khawm an ṭhung a, an mi sawisêl a, Nisienlakhawm, i siehlaw hin i thuruothai chu a ngaituo lem a nih.

en: Thy testimonies also are my delight And my counsellors. ד DALETH.
hmr: I thuinhriettirhai chu ka lâwmna a na, Rem mi ruotpêktu khawm a nih.

en: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: Quicken thou me according to thy word.
hmr: Ka hringna hi pilvutah a kawp tlat a, I thu ang peiin mi sukhar rawh.

en: I declared my ways, and thou answeredst me: Teach me thy statutes.
hmr: Ka um dânhai chu kân hriettir cheh a, nangin i mi dawn a, I thuruothai chu mîn chûktir rawh.

en: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: So shall I meditate on thy wondrous works.
hmr: I thununna kawng chu mîn hrietthiemtir la, Chuongchun, i thilmak thaw thuhai chu ngaituong ka tih.

en: My soul melteth for heaviness: Strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
hmr: Ka hringna hi lungngai leiin a zawphmang hlak a, I thu ang peiin mi sukhrât rawh,

en: Remove from me the way of falsehood; And grant me thy law graciously.
hmr: Um dân indik naw hi ka kuoma inthawkin la hmang la, I dân chu lunginsiettakin mi pe rawh.

en: I have chosen the way of faithfulness: Thine ordinances have I set before me.
hmr: Umdân ringum ka thlang a, I rorêlnahai ka hmaah kân umtir a.

en: I cleave unto thy testimonies: O Jehovah, put me not to shame.
hmr: I thuinhriettirhai chu ka chel tlat a, Aw LALPA, mi sukmuolpho naw rawh.

en: I will run the way of thy commandments, When thou shalt enlarge my heart. ה HE.
hmr: I thupêk lampuia chun tlân ka ta, Ka lungril hi i suklien pha chun.

en: Teach me, O Jehovah, the way of thy statutes; And I shall keep it unto the end.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i thuruot lampui chu mîn entir la, Chuongchun, a tâwp chenin ka hraw ding annâwm.

en: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; Yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.
hmr: Hrietthiemna mi pe la, chuongchun, i dân chu ka vawng ṭha ding annâwm, Anih, ka lungril po po hin zâwm ka tih.

en: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; For therein do I delight.
hmr: I thupêk lampuia chun mîn fetir la, Chutaka chun ka lâwm sih a.

en: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, And not to covetousness.
hmr: I thuinhriettir tienga chun ka lungril hi inthlêktir la, Duâmna tiengah ni loin.

en: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity, And quicken me in thy ways.
hmr: Thil teplo mei mei en lo dingin ka mit mîn lâktir la, I lampuihaia chun mi sukhar rawh.

en: Confirm unto thy servant thy word, Which is in order unto the fear of thee.
hmr: I thu chu i siehlaw kuoma hin sukdet la, Chu chu nangma ṭinaa mi a nih.

en: Turn away my reproach whereof I am afraid; For thine ordinances are good.
hmr: Mi hrilsietna ka ṭi hi la hmang la, I rorêlhai chu a ṭha sih a.

en: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: Quicken me in thy righteousness. ו VAV.
hmr: Ngai ta, i thununna thuhai chu hriet kân hâwk hlak a, I felna leiin mi sukhar rawh.

en: Let thy lovingkindnesses also come unto me, O Jehovah, Even thy salvation, according to thy word.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i ngilneina chu ka kuomah hung raw se, I sandamna ngei chu, i thu ang peiin.

en: So shall I have an answer for him that reproacheth me; For I trust in thy word.
hmr: Chuongchun, a mi hrilsetu dawnna ding nei ka tih, I thu ka ring sih a.

en: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; For I have hoped in thine ordinances.
hmr: Chun, thutak thu chu ka baua inthawk hin la suok vawng naw la, I rorêlnahai chu ka beisei si hlak a.

en: So shall I observe thy law continually For ever and ever.
hmr: Chuongchun, i dân chu zâwm rawp ka tih, Kumkhawtluongin.

en: And I shall walk at liberty; For I have sought thy precepts.
hmr: Chun, hluotu neiloin lêng ka ta, I thununna thuhai chu ka zawng sih a.

en: I will also speak of thy testimonies before kings, And shall not be put to shame.
hmr: I thuinhriettir thuhai chu lalruol hmaah hril ka ta, Inzak naw ningah.

en: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, Which I have loved.
hmr: Chun, i thupêk ka ngainat chunga chun, Lâwm ka tih.

en: I will lift up my hands also unto thy commandments, which I have loved; And I will meditate on thy statutes. ז ZAYIN.
hmr: I thupêk ka ngainat tienghaia chun ka kuthai phar ka ta, I thuruothai chu ngaituong ka tih.

en: Remember the word unto thy servant, Because thou hast made me to hope.
hmr: I siehlaw kuoma thutiem chu hre zing la, Nangin i mîn beiseitir leiin.

en: This is my comfort in my affliction; For thy word hath quickened me.
hmr: Chu chu ka rinumnaa khawm ka thlamuongna a nih, I thu chun a mi sukhar ta sih a.

en: The proud have had me greatly in derision: Yet have I not swerved from thy law.
hmr: Chapohai chun nasatakin an mi nuizat a, Nisienlakhawm, i dân chu ka fe pêtsan nawh.

en: I have remembered thine ordinances of old, O Jehovah, And have comforted myself.
hmr: Aw LALPA, tiena i rorêlhai chu ka hriet zing a, Kei le kei kân thlamuon hlak.

en: Hot indignation hath taken hold upon me, Because of the wicked that forsake thy law.
hmr: Lungninawna nasatak hin a mi tlâk khum a. Mi rilo i dân fesantuhai leiin.

en: Thy statutes have been my songs In the house of my pilgrimage.
hmr: Ka khuol inzinna ina hin, I thuruothai chu ka hla a ni hlak.

en: I have remembered thy name, O Jehovah, in the night, And have observed thy law.
hmr: Aw LALPA, zâna chun i hming ka hriet zing hlak a, I dân khawm ka zâwm hlak.

en: This I have had, Because I have kept thy precepts. ח HHETH.
hmr: Chuong chu ka nei a, I thununna thuhai chu ka vawngṭhat leiin.

en: Jehovah is my portion: I have said that I would observe thy words.
hmr: LALPA chu ka chanvo a nih, I thu chu zâwm ka tih ti ka hril ta kha.

en: I entreated thy favor with my whole heart: Be merciful unto me according to thy word.
hmr: Ka lungril po poin i lungin- sietna ka ngên a, I thu ang peiin mi lunginsiet rawh.

en: I thought on my ways, And turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
hmr: Ka um dânhai ka ngaituoh a, I thuinhriettir tienga chun ka ke ka pên tah a.

en: I made haste, and delayed not, To observe thy commandments.
hmr: I thupêkhai zâwm dingin, Kân hmawh a, sâwt ka riel nawh.

en: The cords of the wicked have wrapped me round; But I have not forgotten thy law.
hmr: Mi rilohai hruihruolhai chun a mi zem hlawm zing a, Nisienlakhawm, i dân chu ka theinghil nawh.

en: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee Because of thy righteous ordinances.
hmr: Zânrila chun lâwmthu hril ding chein tho ka ta, I rorêl felhai lei chun.

en: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, And of them that observe thy precepts.
hmr: Nangma ṭituhai po po le, I thununna thuhai zâwmtuhai ruol ka nih.

en: The earth, O Jehovah, is full of thy lovingkindness: Teach me thy statutes. ט TETH.
hmr: Aw LALPA, leihnuoi hi i ngilneinaa sip a nih, I thuruothai chu mîn chûktir rawh.

en: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O Jehovah, according unto thy word.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i thu ang peiin, I siehlaw hi i thaw ṭha hlak.

en: Teach me good judgment and knowledge; For I have believed in thy commandments.
hmr: Ngaituo thiemna le hrietna mîn chûktir la, I thupêkhai chu ka ring sih a.

en: Before I was afflicted I went astray; But now I observe thy word.
hmr: Sukrinuma ka um hma khan kân vâk hmang hlak a, Tu ruok hin chu i thu ka zâwm tah.

en: Thou art good, and doest good; Teach me thy statutes.
hmr: Nang chu i ṭhah a, thil ṭha i thaw bawk a, I thuruothai chu mîn chûktir rawh.

en: The proud have forged a lie against me: With my whole heart will I keep thy precepts.
hmr: Chapohai chun ka chungah khêl an phuokfâwm a, Ka lungril po po hin i thununna thuhai chu vawng ṭhâng ka tih.

en: Their heart is as fat as grease; But I delight in thy law.
hmr: An lungril chu rîlrâng thau angin a thau a, Kei ruok chu i dân chungah ka lâwm hlak.

en: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; That I may learn thy statutes.
hmr: I thuruothai chu kân chûk thiem theina dinga, Sukrinuma ka lo um kha ka ta dingin a ṭha a nih.

en: The law of thy mouth is better unto me Than thousands of gold and silver. י YODH.
hmr: Rângkachak le tangka sâng tamtak nêk chun, I baua dân suok chu ka ta dingin a ṭha lem.

en: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: Give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.
hmr: I kutin i mi siemin, i mîn din a nih, I thupêkhai chu kân chûk thiem theina dingin hrietthiemna mi pe rawh.

en: They that fear thee shall see me and be glad, Because I have hoped in thy word.
hmr: Nangma ṭituhai chun mi hmûng an ta, lâwm an tih, I thu chu ka beisei hlak leiin.

en: I know, O Jehovah, that thy judgments are righteous, And that in faithfulness thou hast afflicted me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i rorêlhai chu a fel ti le, Nang chun ringumtakin a nih i mi sukrinum chu ti ka hriet.

en: Let, I pray thee, thy lovingkindness be for my comfort, According to thy word unto thy servant.
hmr: I siehlaw kuoma i thutiem ang peiin, Lunginsiettakin i ngilneina chu ka thlamuongna ding ni raw se.

en: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live; For thy law is my delight.
hmr: Ka hring theina dingin i lai- natnahai chu ka kuomah hung raw se, I dân chu ka lâwmna a ni sih a.

en: Let the proud be put to shame; for they have overthrown me wrongfully: But I will meditate on thy precepts.
hmr: Chapohai chu muolphoin um raw se, indik nawtakin an mi suktlâwm ta sih a, Nisienlakhawm, i thununna thuhai chu ngaituong ka tih.

en: Let those that fear thee turn unto me; And they shall know thy testimonies.
hmr: Nangma ṭituhai chu keia tieng hung ngha hai sienla, Chuongchun, i thuinhriettir- hai chu an hriet ding annâwm.

en: Let my heart be perfect in thy statutes, That I be not put to shame. כ KAPH.
hmr: Ka muolpho nawna dingin, Ka lungril hi i thuruothaia chun ṭha famkimin um raw se.

en: My soul fainteth for thy salvation; But I hope in thy word.
hmr: Ka hringna hi i sandamna ngaiin a chau tah a, Nisienlakhawm, i thu ka beisei hlak.

en: Mine eyes fail for thy word, While I say, When wilt thou comfort me?
hmr: I thu thlîrnân ka mit ân vai zo tah a, “Nangin iengtik am mi thlamuon i ta?” ka ti ka ti hlak.

en: For I am become like a wine-skin in the smoke; Yet do I not forget thy statutes.
hmr: Meikhu thlûta savun peng ang chu ka hung ni tah a, Nisienlakhawm, i thuruothai chu ka theinghil nawh.

en: How many are the days of thy servant? When wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?
hmr: I siehlaw kum chin ding hi iengzât am nîng a ta? A mi suknawmnatuhai chunga hin iengtik am ro i rêl ding a na?

en: The proud have digged pits for me, Who are not according to thy law.
hmr: Mi chapo, i dân anga um nawhai chun, Ka tlâkna dingin khurhai an cho a.

en: All thy commandments are faithful: They persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.
hmr: I thupêk po po chu ring a um a nih, Anni chun indik nawtakin an mi suknawmna hlak hi, mi ṭhangpui rawh.

en: They had almost consumed me upon earth; But I forsook not thy precepts.
hmr: Anni chun hnuoia hin an mi sukbohmang vâng vâng a, Nisienlakhawm, i thununna thuhai chu ka nghatsan si nawh a.

en: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; So shall I observe the testimony of thy mouth. ל LAMEDH.
hmr: I ngilneina ang peiin mi sukhar la, Chuongchun, i baua thuinhriet- tir chu ka zâwm ding annâwm.

en: For ever, O Jehovah, Thy word is settled in heaven.
hmr: Aw LALPA, kumkhawtluonga dingin, I thu chu vânah dettakin a um a;

en: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: Thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
hmr: I ringumna chu suon po po chenin um a ta, Leihnuoi hi i sukdet a, a um zing a nih.

en: They abide this day according to thine ordinances; For all things are thy servants.
hmr: Chuonghai chu vawisûn hin i rorêlhai angin an um zing a, Thil po po chu i siehlawhai an ni sih a.

en: Unless thy law had been my delight, I should then have perished in mine affliction.
hmr: I dân chu ka lâwmna ni naw sienla chu, Ka rinumnaa khan ka bohmang ta ding a nih.

en: I will never forget thy precepts; For with them thou hast quickened me.
hmr: I thununna thuhai chu ieng- tika khawm theinghil naw ning, Nangin chuong chun mi i sukhar ta sih a.

en: I am thine, save me; For I have sought thy precepts.
hmr: I ta ka ni hi, mi sandam rawh, I thununna thuhai chu ka zawng sih a.

en: The wicked have waited for me, to destroy me; But I will consider thy testimonies.
hmr: Mi rilohai chun mi sukbohmang tumin an mi nghâk sih a, Nisienlakhawm, i thuinhriet- tirhai chu ngaituong ka tih.

en: I have seen an end of all perfection; But thy commandment is exceeding broad. מ MEM.
hmr: Ṭhat famkimna po po tâwpna chu ka hmu tah a, I thupêk ruok chu a lien khawp el a nih.

en: Oh how love I thy law! It is my meditation all the day.
hmr: Aw, i dân hi ka va ngaina de aw! Sûnnithlâka ka ngaituo hlak chu a nih.

en: Thy commandments make me wiser than mine enemies; For they are ever with me.
hmr: I thupêkhai chun a mi dotuhai nêka var lemin a mi siem a, Kumkhawtluonga ka kuoma a um zing hlak leiin.

en: I have more understanding than all my teachers; For thy testimonies are my meditation.
hmr: A mîn chûktirtuhai po po nêkin varna ka nei lem a nih, I thuinhriettirhai hi ka ngaituo a ni hlak leiin.

en: I understand more than the aged, Because I have kept thy precepts.
hmr: Tarhai nêk chun ka hriet thiem lem a nih, I thununna thuhai hi ka vawng ṭhat leiin.

en: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, That I might observe thy word.
hmr: I thu ka zâwm theina dingin, Lampui suola hrim hrim chun ka kehai hi pên ka phal nawh.

en: I have not turned aside from thine ordinances; For thou hast taught me.
hmr: I rorêlnaa inthawk chun ka pêt hmang nawh a, Nangin i mîn chûktir leiin.

en: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! Yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
hmr: I thuhai hi ka bau ta dingin a va thlum de; Anih, ka bau ta ding chun khuoizu nêkin a thlum lem.

en: Through thy precepts I get understanding: Therefore I hate every false way. נ NUN.
hmr: I thununna thuhai leiin hrietthiemna ka nei hlak, Chuleiin, um dân indik naw tinrêng hi ka theida a nih.

en: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, And light unto my path.
hmr: I thu hi ka kehai ta dingin khâwnvar a na, Ka lampuia dingin var a nih.

en: I have sworn, and have confirmed it, That I will observe thy righteous ordinances.
hmr: I rorêlna feltakhai chu zâwm dingin, Ṭawng kân khâm a, ka sukdet bawk a.

en: I am afflicted very much: Quicken me, O Jehovah, according unto thy word.
hmr: Nasataka sukrinumin ka um a, Aw LALPA, i thu ang peiin mi sukhar rawh.

en: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill-offerings of my mouth, O Jehovah, And teach me thine ordinances.
hmr: Aw LALPA, lunginsiettakin, ka baua nuomthua thilpêkhai hi la la, I rorêlnahai chu mîn chûktir rawh.

en: My soul is continually in my hand; Yet do I not forget thy law.
hmr: Ka hringna hi ka kutah a um rawp hlak a, Nisienlakhawm, i dân chu ka theinghil ngai nawh a.

en: The wicked have laid a snare for me; Yet have I not gone astray from thy precepts.
hmr: Mi rilohai chun ka âwkna dingin châng an kam a, Nisienlakhawm, i thununna thuhai chu kân vâk hmangsan nawh.

en: Thy testimonies have I taken as a heritage for ever; For they are the rejoicing of my heart.
hmr: I thuinhriettirhai chu kum- khawtluonga ka ro dingin ka lâk a, Ka lungril suklâwmtu a ni sih a.

en: I have inclined my heart to perform thy statutes For ever, even unto the end. ס SAMEKH.
hmr: Kumkhawtluongin, a tâwp chenin, I thuruothai anga thaw dingin ka lungril kân thlêktir a.

en: I hate them that are of a double mind; But thy law do I love.
hmr: Lungril mumal neilo mihai chu ka theidah a, I dân ruok chu ka ngaina a nih.

en: Thou art my hiding-place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
hmr: Nang chu kân bîkhmangna le ka phaw i na, I thu ka beisei a nih.

en: Depart from me, ye evil-doers, That I may keep the commandments of my God.
hmr: Nangni thil ṭha naw thawtu- hai, mi mâksan ro, Ka Pathien thilpêkhai ka vawng ṭhat theina dingin.

en: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live; And let me not be ashamed of my hope.
hmr: Ka hring theina dingin i thu ang peiin mi chel zing la, Ka beisei chunga hin inzakin mîn umtir naw rawh.

en: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe, And shall have respect unto thy statutes continually.
hmr: Mi kei la, chuongchun, him ka ta, I thuruothai chu ka pawisa rawp ding a nih.

en: Thou hast set at nought all them that err from thy statutes; For their deceit is falsehood.
hmr: I thuruothai invâkhmangsantuhai po po chu i hmusit a, An hlêmna chu khêl a ni sih a.

en: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: Therefore I love thy testimonies.
hmr: Hnuoia mi rilohai po po chu thilêksie angin i sukbohmang hlak a, Chuleiin, i thuinhriettirhai chu ka ngaina a nih.

en: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; And I am afraid of thy judgments. ע AYIN.
hmr: Ka tisa hi nangma ṭîin ân thin a, I rorêlnahai chu ka ṭî bawk a.

en: I have done justice and righteousness: Leave me not to mine oppressors.
hmr: Ro ka rêl a, feltakin ka thaw hlak a nih, A mi nêksâwrtuhaia inthawkin mi thlathlam naw rawh.

en: Be surety for thy servant for good: Let not the proud oppress me.
hmr: I siehlaw chungchâng thuah, a ṭhatna dingin a bul tum la, Chapohaiin mi nêksâwr naw raw se.

en: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, And for thy righteous word.
hmr: I sandamna thlîrnân ka mit ân vai zo tah a, I thu feltak thlîrna leh.

en: Deal with thy servant according unto thy lovingkindness, And teach me thy statutes.
hmr: I ngilneina ang peiin i siehlaw chunga hin thaw la, I thuruothai chu mîn chûktir rawh.

en: I am thy servant; give me understanding, That I may know thy testimonies.
hmr: I siehlaw ka na, hrietthiemna mi pe la, I thuinhriettirhai chu ka hriet theina dingin.

en: It is time for Jehovah to work; For they have made void thy law.
hmr: LALPA, sinthaw a hun tah, I dân hi ieng ni loin an siem ta sih a.

en: Therefore I love thy commandments Above gold, yea, above fine gold.
hmr: Chuleiin, i thupêkhai chu rângkachak nêkin ka ngaina a nih, Anih, rângkachak inthieng nêk khawma.

en: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; And I hate every false way. פ PE.
hmr: Chuleiin, kawng tinrêng thuah, i thununna thuhai po po chu indikin ka hriet a, Um dân indik naw tinrêng hi ka theida a nih.

en: Thy testimonies are wonderful; Therefore doth my soul keep them.
hmr: I thuinhrietirhai chu a mak a nih, Chuleiin, ka hringna hin a vawng ṭha hlak.

en: The opening of thy words giveth light; It giveth understanding unto the simple.
hmr: I thu hrilfie hin mihai a sukvar a, Mi mâwlhai chu ân hrietthiem- tir hlak.

en: I opened wide my mouth, and panted; For I longed for thy commandments.
hmr: Ka bau ka ka lien a, kân thuok hlawp hlawp a, I thupêkhai chu ka châk leiin.

en: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me, As thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.
hmr: Keia tieng hung ngha la, mi lunginsiet rawh, I hming ngainatuhai i lunginsiet ang khan.

en: Establish my footsteps in thy word; And let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
hmr: Ka ke pênhai hi i thuah sukdet la, Suolna hrim hrim ka chungah thu inneitir naw rawh.

en: Redeem me from the oppression of man: So will I observe thy precepts.
hmr: Mihriem nêksâwrnaa inthawk chun mi sanhim la, Chuongchun, i thununna thuhai chu ka zâwm ding annâwm.

en: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; And teach me thy statutes.
hmr: I hmêlin i siehlaw sunvar la, I thuruothai chu mîn chûktir rawh.

en: Streams of water run down mine eyes, Because they observe not thy law. צ TSADHE.
hmr: Ka mitthli hi vadung tui angin a luong thlah a, I dân an zâwm naw leiin.

en: Righteous art thou, O Jehovah, And upright are thy judgments.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nang chu i fel a, I rorêlhai khawm ân dik a nih.

en: Thou hast commanded thy testimonies in righteousness And very faithfulness.
hmr: I thuinhriettirhai chu feltak le, Ringum êm êmin thu i pêk a.

en: My zeal hath consumed me, Because mine adversaries have forgotten thy words.
hmr: Ka ṭhahnemngaina hin a mi sukbohmang tah a, A mi dotuhaiin i thu an theinghil leiin.

en: Thy word is very pure; Therefore thy servant loveth it.
hmr: I thu hi ân thieng êm êm a nih, Chuleiin, i siehlaw hin a ngaina a nih.

en: I am small and despised; Yet do I not forget thy precepts.
hmr: Mi chîn mi hmusit ka na, Nisienlakhawm, i thununna thuhai chu ka theinghil ngai nawh.

en: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, And thy law is truth.
hmr: I felna chu kumkhawtluong felna ding a na, I dân khawm thutak a nih.

en: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me; Yet thy commandments are my delight.
hmr: lunginzîngna le thlaphâng- na chun a mi tlâk khum tah a, Nisienlakhawm, i thupêkhai hi ka lâwmna a nih.

en: Thy testimonies are righteous for ever: Give me understanding, and I shall live. ק QOPH.
hmr: I thuinhriettirhai chu kumkhuoa dingin a fel a nih, Hrietthiemna mi pe la; chuongchun, hring zing ka tih.

en: I have called with my whole heart; answer me, O Jehovah: I will keep thy statutes.
hmr: Ka lungril po poin ka ko cheh a, Aw LALPA, mi dawn rawh; I thuruothai chu ka vawng ṭha ding annâwm.

en: I have called unto thee; save me, And I shall observe thy testimonies.
hmr: Ka ko hlak cheh a, mi sandam rawh; Chuongchun, i thuinhriettirhai chu ka zâwm ding annâwm.

en: I anticipated the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy words.
hmr: Varṭien chu ka khal a, ka khêk hlak a, I thuhai chu ka beisei hlak.

en: Mine eyes anticipated the night-watches, That I might meditate on thy word.
hmr: I thu ka ngaituo theina dingin, Ka mitin zân vêng hunbihai chu a meng khal hlak.

en: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: Quicken me, O Jehovah, according to thine ordinances.
hmr: I zainêmna ang peiin ka râwl hi ngai la, Aw LALPA, i rorêlnahai ang peiin mi sukhar rawh.

en: They draw nigh that follow after wickedness; They are far from thy law.
hmr: Ngaituona suol hnawttuhai chun an hung hnai a, Anni chu i dân hlata um an nih.

en: Thou art nigh, O Jehovah; And all thy commandments are truth.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nang chu i hnai a, I thupêk po po chu thutak a nih.

en: Of old have I known from thy testimonies, That thou hast founded them for ever. ר RESH.
hmr: Tienlaiin, i thuinhriettirhaia inthawkin, Chuong chu kumkhawtluonga dingin i sukdet ti ka lo hriet tah.

en: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me; For I do not forget thy law.
hmr: Ka rimsikzie hi ngaituo la, mi sanhim rawh, I dân chu ka theinghil ngai si nawh a.

en: Plead thou my cause, and redeem me: Quicken me according to thy word.
hmr: Ka thu mi hrilpuiin mîn tlan la, I thu ang peiin mi sukhar rawh.

en: Salvation is far from the wicked; For they seek not thy statutes.
hmr: Sandamna chu mi rilohaia inthawk chun a hla a nih, I thuruothai chu an zawng naw leiin.

en: Great are thy tender mercies, O Jehovah: Quicken me according to thine ordinances.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i lainatnahai chu a nasa a nih, I rorêlnahai ang peiin mi sukhar rawh.

en: Many are my persecutors and mine adversaries; Yet have I not swerved from thy testimonies.
hmr: A mi suknawmnatu le a mi dotuhai chu tamtak an nih. Nisienlakhawm, i thu inhriettirhai chu ka pêt san nawh.

en: I beheld the treacherous, and was grieved, Because they observe not thy word.
hmr: Vervêktaka thawtuhai chu, ka en a, ka lungni nawh a, I thu an zâwm naw leiin.

en: Consider how I love thy precepts: Quicken me, O Jehovah, according to thy lovingkindness.
hmr: I thununna thuhai ka ngainatzie hi ngaituo la, Aw LALPA, i ngilneina ang peiin mi sukhar rawh.

en: The sum of thy word is truth; And every one of thy righteous ordinances endureth for ever. ש SHIN.
hmr: I thu inpawl khâwm chu thutak a nih, I rorêlna fel tinrêng khawm hi kumkhawtluongin um zing a tih.

en: Princes have persecuted me without a cause; But my heart standeth in awe of thy words.
hmr: Mi lienhaiin a san um loin an mi suknawmna a, Nisienlakhawm, ka lungril chun i thuhai a nih a ṭî chu.

en: I rejoice at thy word, As one that findeth great spoil.
hmr: I thua hin ka hlim a nih, Thil ropuitak râllâka hmutu angin.

en: I hate and abhor falsehood; But thy law do I love.
hmr: Khêl hi ka theidain ka tirdak a, I dân ruok chu ka ngaina a nih.

en: Seven times a day do I praise thee, Because of thy righteous ordinances.
hmr: Ni khatah vawi sari kân pâk hlak che a nih, I rorêl felhai leiin.

en: Great peace have they that love thy law; And they have no occasion of stumbling.
hmr: I dân ngainatuhai chun thla- muongna nasatak an nei a, Tlûkna hrim hrim an nei nawh.

en: I have hoped for thy salvation, O Jehovah, And have done thy commandments.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i sandamna ka beisei zing a, I thupêkhai angin ka thaw hlak.

en: My soul hath observed thy testimonies; And I love them exceedingly.
hmr: Ka hringna hin i thuinhriet- tirhai chu a zâwm hlak a, Ka ngaina êm êm a nih.

en: I have observed thy precepts and thy testimonies; For all my ways are before thee. ת TAV.
hmr: I thununna thuhai le i thuinhriettirhai chu ka zâwm hlak a, Ka um dân po po khawm hi i hmaa um a ni sih a.

en: Let my cry come near before thee, O Jehovah: Give me understanding according to thy word.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ka khêkri hi i hmaah hung hnai raw se, I thu ang peiin hrietthiemna mi pe rawh.

en: Let my supplication come before thee: Deliver me according to thy word.
hmr: Lunginsiet ka hnina hi i hmaah tlung raw se: I thu ang peiin mi sanhim rawh.

en: Let my lips utter praise; For thou teachest me thy statutes.
hmr: Ka hmûr hin inpâkna thu hril raw se, Nangin i thuruot thuhai chu i mîn chûktir hlak leiin.

en: Let my tongue sing of thy word; For all thy commandments are righteousness.
hmr: Ka lei hi,i thu inpâkin hla sak raw se, I thupêk po po chu felna a ni leiin.

en: Let thy hand be ready to help me; For I have chosen thy precepts.
hmr: I kut chu mi ṭhangpui dinga inzosain um raw se, I thununna thuhai chu ka thlang sih a.

en: I have longed for thy salvation, O Jehovah; And thy law is my delight.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i sandamna chu ka châk hlak a, I dân chu ka lâwmna a nih.

en: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; And let thine ordinances help me.
hmr: Ka hringna hi hring raw se; chuongchun, ân pâk ding che annâwm, I rorêlnahai khawmin mi ṭhangpui raw se.

en: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; For I do not forget thy commandments.
hmr: Berâm inhmang angin kân vâkhmang a, i siehlaw hi zawng rawh. I thupêkhai chu ka theinghil ngai si nawh.
